body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         Pocket gophers dig burrows underground searching for food and can be very damaging to archeological sites. NPS Photo by Sally King  Bandelier has a Junior Ranger program for kids from kindergarten to 6th grade and a Deputy Ranger program for those older individuals who want to participate. For more information click on the Be A Junior Ranger link. Special Resources for Boy Scouts Special Resources for Girl Scouts
